column1: Smoque BBQ////The food is perfectly prepared tender and the smoke taste does not overwhelm the meat.  Fries are fresh cut
column2: not over salted and very delicious. The coleslaw is vinegar based and very fresh.   The brisket chili  side will make cap off your main dish.  For dessert
column3: the pecan bread pudding will have you kicking yourself for not ordering two.  Don't plan on splitting this delight
column4: its portion is perfect for one and it is so good that you will not utter "only a bite for me".
